title: New: Stay + – Guardian (Feat. Daniel O'Sullivan)
body:
Manchester duo **Stay +** sure know how to experiment, with their new EP _**Arem**_ set to be released on limited edition (144 copies) folded **50″**, specially packaged with a bunch of extras and downloadable content.

Featuring the previously heard _Dandelion Seed_ (Feat. **Psychologist**) alongside four new tracks, including a collaboration with **Daniel O’Sullivan** (**Sun O))))** and **Miracle**), _**Arem**_ showcases the groups intention to push the boundaries of our preconceptions of a physical release.

_Guardian_, the first single from the EP is a **Crystal Castles**\-esque dance number, floaty vocals and side-chain compressed synths dominating the track to fantastic effect. Check out _Guardian_ below, and get more info on the _**Arem**_ EP release via their [official site](http://www.stay.cx/arem/).
